sentences.en: Et loin des beaux discours, des grandes th é ories.
sentences.cn: 在我们记忆犹新的小时里, 他度过,自己的生命.

sentences.en: He girded up his loin to face his competitor.
sentences.cn: 他做好准备来迎战他的对手.

sentences.en: Heat the honey and brush it on to the outside of the loin.
sentences.cn: 将蜂蜜加热后涂抹在腰子的表面。

sentences.en: Influence of harvest processes of pork loin and ham quality.
sentences.cn: 猪腰的加工过程对火腿质量的影响.

sentences.en: Loin short and wide with very little tuck - up.
sentences.cn: 短而宽,非常轻微地上提.

sentences.en: Loin Viewed from the top, broad and strong.
sentences.cn: 从上面观察, 宽且强壮.

sentences.en: Mais toi , aussi loin que tu es , peux - tu le ressentir?
sentences.cn: 可是, 远方的你能感受到 吗 ?

sentences.en: Moi un jour j'irai plus loin , que les chemins qui m'entourent.
sentences.cn: 有一天我要远走高飞, 走出我周围的小径.

sentences.en: Pork loin is very lean meat and isn't too expensive.
sentences.cn: 猪里脊肉是瘦肉,并且不贵.

sentences.en: Pork: Lean cuts ( tenderloin, boneless loin chops ) compare favorably with skinless chicken.
sentences.cn: 猪肉: 精瘦肉(脊肉, 去骨里脊 ) 可以与去皮的鸡肉媲美.

sentences.en: That's true. loin is a cat, a very big cat.
sentences.cn: 对的. 狮子也是猫科类,男装店代理推荐, 一只非常大的猫.

sentences.en: The back line appearing practically level from the shoulders to the loin.
sentences.cn: 从马肩隆到腰部,背线看起来几乎是完全水平的.

sentences.en: The loin is very slightly arched, of medium breadth and muscled.
sentences.cn: 非常轻微的圆拱, 中等宽度,且肌肉发达.

sentences.en: The loin well arched and drooping to the tail.
sentences.cn: 腰部圆拱,向尾巴方向下垂.

sentences.en: The toxic ingredients are a loin and aloe - emodin.

trans.tran_cn: 腰部，（牛，羊等的）腰肉，耻骨区
trans.tran_en: a piece of meat from the lower part of an animal’s back
